name: Hoodo
description:
Hoodo is a stealth game.
where an immortal body escapes the city as a result of an experiment.

Players aim to steal Hoodo to sneak up to a specific location.
Solve using immortal bodies or provide puzzles to identify and solve elements in a given environment.
Here comes various enemies that constantly harass the player.

Explore your path, identify potential threats, anticipate, and reach your goal
